newsitem.title: FINLAND: Finland Bank tender rate unchanged at 3.10 percent.
newsitem.headline: Finland Bank tender rate unchanged at 3.10 percent.

text.p: The Bank of Finland on Friday injected 3.10 billion markka of spot liquidity in an auction of one-month paper at an unchanged 3.10 percent tender rate.
Before the opening, the central bank forecast a spot liquidity surplus of 3.30 billion markka. The required daily balance for banks was 3.03 billion markka.
The Bank of Finland's tender rate -- its chief monetary policy tool -- was lowered to 3.10 percent from 3.25 percent on September 18.
